column3: Good move - seems to be a daily occurrence to get translations PRs.\n

Automatic sanity-testing: PASSED, see http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/15283971359a646c026070701529edccccefe49e for binaries and test log.\nThis test script verifies pulls every time they are updated. It, however, dies sometimes and fails to test properly.  If you are waiting on a test, please check timestamps to verify that the test.log is moving at http://jenkins.bluematt.me/pull-tester/cu
I would write `We do not` over `We cannot`\n
